main event: School children in Cleveland, Ohio observed a circular object with large appendages sticking out from the bottom, hovering over their school in November 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed by a group of school children aged 10-12 years old.
The object hovered over the school for a short time before flying away rapidly.
One of the children wrote about the object on a blackboard in the school during a subsequent class.
The Air Force's Project Blue Book investigated the sighting but concluded there was insufficient data to evaluate it.
The Air Force appreciated the civilian's interest in reporting the sighting.
sighted object: a circular object with large appendages
